verses.text: And it came to pass \w after|strong="H0310"\w* these \w things|strong="H1697"\w*, \add that\add* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w* had a \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, which \add was\add* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, hard \w by|strong="H0681"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1964"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*.

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* me thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, that I may have it for a \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w herbs|strong="H3419"\w*, because it \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w unto|strong="H0681"\w* my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee for it a \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* than it; \add or\add*, if it seem \w good|strong="H2896"\w* to \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w worth|strong="H4242"\w* of it in \w money|strong="H3701"\w*.\f + \fr 21.2 \ft seem…: Heb. be good in thine eyes\f*

And \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w forbid|strong="H2486"\w* it me, that I should \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of my \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* unto thee.

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w heavy|strong="H5620"\w* and \w displeased|strong="H2198"\w* because of the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w* had \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* to him: for he had \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of my \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*. And he laid him \w down|strong="H7901"\w* upon his \w bed|strong="H4296"\w*, and turned \w away|strong="H5437"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and would \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*.

¶ But \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to him, and \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, Why is thy \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* so \w sad|strong="H5620"\w*, that thou \w eatest|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*?

And he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto her, Because I \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* me thy \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*; or else, if it \w please|strong="H2655"\w* thee, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \add another\add* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* for it: and he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee my \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*.

And \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Dost thou now \w govern|strong="H6213"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \add and\add* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and let thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* be \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*: I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*.

So she \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* in \w Ahab’s|strong="H0256"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w sealed|strong="H2856"\w* \add them\add* with his \w seal|strong="H2368"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* the \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* and to the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* that \add were\add* in his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* with \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*.

And she \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w letters|strong="H5612"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* on \w high|strong="H7218"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:\f + \fr 21.9 \ft on high…: Heb. in the top of the people\f*

And \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, before him, to bear \w witness|strong="H5749"\w* against him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou didst \w blaspheme|strong="H1288"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. And \add then\add* carry him \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w stone|strong="H5619"\w* him, that he may \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add even\add* the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* and the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* who were the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* in his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto them, \add and\add* as it \add was\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w letters|strong="H5612"\w* which she had \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto them.
They \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* a \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, and \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* on \w high|strong="H7218"\w* among the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* in \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* before him: and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w* \w witnessed|strong="H5749"\w* against him, \add even\add* against \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, in the presence of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* did \w blaspheme|strong="H1288"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. Then they carried him \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H2351"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w* him with \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, that he \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.
Then they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* is \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*, and is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, when \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* was \w stoned|strong="H5619"\w*, and was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, that \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, take \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* of the \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*, which he \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee for \w money|strong="H3701"\w*: for \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* is not \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, but \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, that \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*, to take \w possession|strong="H3423"\w* of it.
¶ And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which \add is\add* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*: behold, \add he is\add* in the \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, whither he is gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, Hast thou \w killed|strong="H7523"\w*, and also taken \w possession|strong="H3423"\w*? And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, In the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w licked|strong="H3952"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* shall \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w lick|strong="H3952"\w* thy \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, even thine.

And \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w*, Hast thou \w found|strong="H4672"\w* me, O mine \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \add thee:\add* because thou hast \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* thyself to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon thee, and will take \w away|strong="H1197"\w* thy \w posterity|strong="H0310"\w*, and will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* him that \w pisseth|strong="H8366"\w* against the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and him that is shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* and \w left|strong="H5800"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,

And will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, and like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w*, for the \w provocation|strong="H3708"\w* wherewith thou hast provoked \add me\add* to \w anger|strong="H3707"\w*, and made \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2398"\w*.

And of \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* also \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* by the \w wall|strong="H2426"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.\f + \fr 21.23 \ft wall: or, ditch\f*

Him that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* the \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and him that \w dieth|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.

¶ But there was none like unto \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, which did \w sell|strong="H4376"\w* himself to \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, whom \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* stirred \w up|strong="H5496"\w*.\f + \fr 21.25 \ft stirred…: or, incited\f*

And he did \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w abominably|strong="H8581"\w* in \w following|strong="H3212"\w* \w idols|strong="H1544"\w*, according to all \add things\add* as \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cast \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* those \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, that he \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* his \w clothes|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* upon his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* in \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w softly|strong="H0328"\w*.
And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Seest|strong="H7200"\w* thou how \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w humbleth|strong="H3665"\w* himself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me? \w because|strong="H3282"\w* he \w humbleth|strong="H3665"\w* himself \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me, I will not \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in his \w days|strong="H3117"\w*: \add but\add* in his \w son’s|strong="H1121"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.
